description:
Midge, Marbo, and Doc are trapped in a metal cage while trying to rescue Ellen and Wang and they try to use the operation bots to escape, but to no avail. Meanwhile, the frog trio who were looking for Midge and the others ended up sucked into the same black hole and transported to the garbage field! Unfortunately for them, the frogs are found by the resource recovery robot and are taken away, along with Humpty, to be recycled. The resource recovery robot seems to take a special interest in Humpty and sets about remodeling the frogs` support bot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu no Recycle Koujou / Humpty no Arata na Mezame
Recycling Plant of Horror / Humpty`s New Awakening
恐怖のリサイクル工場 / ハンプティの新たな目覚め
